Title: Relates to the restriction of the sale of ammunition to only individuals authorized to possess such weapon; repealer
Summary: Relates to the restriction of the sale of ammunition to only individuals authorized to possess such weapon; creates the no-gun database under the division of criminal justice services.
LawCode: Rpld ยง270.00 sub 5, add ยง265.18, Pen L; add ยง845-c, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the executive law, in relation to the sale of ammunition; and to repeal certain provisions of the penal law relating thereto
